entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • JIT: Missing sign extension for `bswap16` #67723
    7.0.0
  • Improve code coverage of RegexOptions.NonBacktracking #67720
    7.0.0
  • Rolling build test failure: System.Private.Uri.Unit.Tests - iOSSimulator-Release-x64-Mono_Release-OSX #67716
  • Test clientandserver_oneorbothusedefault_ok failing in recent builds #67712
  • Clean up CORINFO_HELP_ASSIGN_BYREF for x86/x64 #67707
    Future
  • Exceptions from EventRecordWrittenEventArgs are missing the original win32 error code #67702
  • Test failure: Attempt #1 - System.Net.Security.Tests.CertificateValidationRemoteServer.CertificateValidationRemoteServer_EndToEnd_Ok(useAsync: True) #67687
  • Test failure: System.Net.Security.Tests.CertificateValidationRemoteServer.DefaultConnect_EndToEnd_Ok(host: \"api.nuget.org\") #67686
  • Test failure：System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.PlatformHandler_HttpClientHandler_SslProtocols_Http2_Test.GetAsync_SupportedSSLVersion_Succeeds(sslProtocols: Tls11, url: \"https://www.ssllabs.com:10302/\") #67685
    7.0.0
  • failure to load a C++/CLI assembly from embedded resources #67684
  • Test failure: System.Net.Security.Tests.CertificateValidationRemoteServer.CertificateValidationRemoteServer_EndToEnd_Ok(useAsync: False) #67683
  • Test failure: System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.SocketsHttpHandler_HttpClientHandler_SslProtocols_Test.GetAsync_SupportedSSLVersion_Succeeds(sslProtocols: Tls11, url: \"https://www.ssllabs.com:10302/\") #67682
    7.0.0
  • Test failure: profiler\\unittest\\getappdomainstaticaddress\\getappdomainstaticaddress.cmd #67679

Closed

  • Test failure System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.RegexKnownPatternTests.PatternsDataSet_ConstructRegexForAll_NonBacktracking #65417
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Diagnostics.Tests.InstanceDataTests.InstanceDataCollectionCollection_CopyTo #67634
  • JSONSourceGenerator: JsonSerializerContext requiring implementing all functions in partial class #66203
  • Getting file descriptor count on macOS throws #65254
  • JsonObject does not respect JsonSerializerOptions e.g. PropertyNamingPolicy = JsonNamingPolicy.CamelCase #65493
  • The framework 'Microsoft.NETCore.App', version '6.0.0' (x64) was not found but 6.0.3 is installed #67293
  • PeriodicTimer Backpressure #67706
  • HttpClientHandler.SupportsAutomaticDecompression throws PlatformNotSupportedException on net6.0-maccatalyst #67529
  • [NativeAOT] Build hangs on .NET 3.1 project #67689
  • [API Proposal]: Provide NamedPipesHttpMessageHandler #67480
  • OSR variants may not report pinned locals as pinned #67668
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'codeGen->isFramePointerUsed() || varDsc->GetStackOffset() >= 0' #67488
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add more string syntax type constants to StringSyntaxAttribute #65634
    7.0.0
  • Instrumented clrjit causes random msbuild failures #67627
  • [wasm][debugger] ValueTypeClass refactoring #63614

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix wrong constant folding for bswap16 #67726
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove dbgshim and related code #67725
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Added the `hard_limit_exceeded_p` back as without it, we won't be retrying another heap to fit the new allocation. #67724
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Improve List performance in IEnumerable.SequenceEqual #67722
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Add NoWASM to category filter #67721
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Bundle net472 dependencies for MonoAOTCompiler task #67719
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Always run CopyAllNativeProjectReferenceBinaries #67718
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Use properties for target versions for core and framework #67717
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Updating generic math to support user-defined checked operators #67714
    area-System.Numerics, 7.0.0
  • Temporarily disable assert to avoid #67600 #67711
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix cross dac packaging #67710
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Re-adding some tests that were commented out now that IgnoreCase work is done #67709
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [release/6.0] Add libssl3 dependency to Debian DEPS package #67705
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-installer, 6.0.x
  • Fixed error messages on collections indexing #67696
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [mono][llvm] Refactor code to make it easier to support LLVM 13.x in … #67692
    NO-MERGE, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Change SuperPMI asm diffs relocation handling #67688
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • VS4Mac crash reports on MacOS v12 (Monterey) are missing native stack frames #67713
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Increase timeout as AOT tests take longer #67708
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [mono][llvm] Add support for llvm 13.x. #67690
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Manually update C# compiler version to a more recent preview #67440
  • Refactor CharSetSolver and friends to avoid unbounded caching #67673
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Various fixes for merged test runners on Mono #67665
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: fix OSR handling for pinned locals #67680
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix OSR local detection for implicit byref promotion #67678
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Simplify JsonTypeInfo construction #67700
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [Android] Disable System.Security.Cryptography tests on x64 and x86 Emulators #67654
  • Enable MSVC standard conformance for JIT sources, try 2 #67695
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add more StringSyntaxAttribute syntaxes #67621
    area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Reenable crossgen2 promotion outside version bubble #66983
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix UB in CreateConstVector (strict alignment) #67669
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update xharness to latest version #67667
  • Split Reflection and SourceGen TypeInfos #67526
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [debugger][wasm] ValueTypeClass refactoring. #63626
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Remove _caseInsensitive field from RegexInterpreter #67681
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0

Updated

  • Change `CrossLoaderAllocatorHash` to not use the GC #67160
    area-TieredCompilation-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [WIP] Faster vsd hashtables #67609
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Retry publish crossgen as AOT (#65948) #67636
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Single-file debugging support in DBI and createdump #67163
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Optimize bswap+mov to movbe on xarch #66965
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [Group 7] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Console` #67459
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging
  • [wasm][debugger] Debug on firefox #61776
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • WIP: switch over JIT/Methodical tests to run using merged wrappers #65597
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [PERF][MAUI] Add iOS Startup Scenario (Runtime side) #67670
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [API Implementation]: Add Microseconds and Nanoseconds to TimeStamp, DateTime, DateTimeOffset, and TimeOnly #67666
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Methods on primitives 65707 #66654
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [Draft] idea how to improve allocations when serializing primitive types #67223
    area-System.Xml, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • runtime: add RIDs for anolis distro #66132
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • S.S.C.Cose: Remove ECDsa and RSA overloads in favor of AsymmetricAlgorithm #67661
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Fix incorrect format string arguments #67464
    area-Host, codeql
  • Enable IDE0060 (Remove unused parameter) analyzer #67527
    area-Meta
  • Add initial impl of PartitionedRateLimiter.Create #67677
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Cache several char[] allocations in System.Private.Xml library methods #67001
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Fix loop cloning of array of struct with array field #67496
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.5
  • Spill low ref count vector that has lot of save/restore #66161
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [runtime] copy updated byref nullables after invoke #67652
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Linux-bionic (Android libc w/o Android interop) initial implementation #66147
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] Perf: Fixes for blazor_scenarios #67414
    arch-wasm, tenet-performance
  • Fix remote unwinding on MacOS Monterey (12) #67602
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.5
  • Handle concurrent reads and concurrent writes on MsQuicStream #67329
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [draft][wasm] JSImport/JSExport prototype #64493
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Only add placeholder pkg file if folder is empty #67647
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Remove char[] allocations from RegistryKey #66918
    area-Microsoft.Win32, tenet-performance
  • Stop passing StandardOptimizationData.mibc to crossgen2 multiple times for SPC #67458
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [HTTP/3] Reenable ResponseCancellation_ServerReceivesCancellation #67535
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Fix exception thrown from MsQuicStream writes when connection is aborted by peer. #67651
    area-System.Net.Http
  • More precise writebarrier for regions #67389
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Support immutable types with configuration binding #67258
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • [draft] JSImportGenerator #66304
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [draft] Use csel for conditional moves #67286
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix read of image_info while raising image_unload event #67138
    area-System.Diagnostics-mono, community-contribution
  • [LibraryImportGenerator] Add/use CustomTypeMarshaller implementations for string marshalling #67635
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, source-generator
  • Fix for the elusive suspension hang on Win7 WOW64 #67628
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [WIP][wasm] Build with emscripten packages, instead of emsdk directly #67626
    area-Build-mono
  • Block implementation details on System.Object #67574
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Code fix to add DisableRuntimeMarshalling when required #67676
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-07
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Emsdk update to 3.1.8 #1885

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Support for GT_DIV and GT_CAST( dbl->lng) #1867

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • mac arm64 vscode unable to find path. Unable to locate the .NET SDK. Check that it is installed and that the version specified in global.json #24753
  • 'dotnet store' can't find crossgen with .NET 6 #24752
  • NU1505: Duplicate 'PackageDownload' items warning is raised when the SDK uses PackageDownload to get packages. #24747
  • Linux and Mac OSX terminal input is not rendered after `Ctrl+C` is used to terminate `dotnet run` #24740
  • macOS arm64 vs. x64: improve PEBKAC handling #24737

Closed

  • PublishReadyToRunComposite and PublishReadyToRunUseCrossgen2 fails #22067

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #24751
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.2xx' #24549
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Revert "deploy common roslyn assemblies used by multiple dotnet tools" #24701
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'main' #24684
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1704651 #24673
    Area-Infrastructure

Issues

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EE does not parse format specifiers when compiling assignments #60639
  • Highlight exit points (C#, C++) #60634
  • Visual Studio help me use Azure App Configuration #60633
  • Quick Action to add missing fields to intializers #60631
  • Suggest lambda when calling method accepting callback #60629
  • `foreach` autocompletion should be offered when ctrl+. is pressed on a variable representing a collection #60628
  • Inheritance margin should add more information to disambiguate identically named items. #60627
  • "..."u8 doesn't work in attributes #60626
  • Stack Trace Explorer doesn't map async methods in stacks to code #60624
  • `IDE2000` and `IDE2003` are passing wrong titles #60621
  • IDE rules don't fail builds - docs say it should as of .NET 6 #60620
  • Double bang shows unexpected error when added to last argument of constructor #60615

Closed

  • NavigableSymbolService.NavigableSymbol should not strongly root a document #59768
    17.2
  • Prioritize background work for visible documents #60185
    17.3
  • link back to code line from Developer PoweShell #60630
  • Refactoring to aid Exception Data Population #60632
  • [LSP] Doc comment completions do not auto-insert attribute content #59773
    17.2

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove the TemporaryWorkspace entirely from the RemoteWorkspace code. #60638
    Area-IDE
  • Pull feature-specific APIs out of ISyntaxFacts #60636
    Area-IDE
  • Update Typescript VS interface #60635
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Generate static abstract interface members correctly #60618
    Area-IDE
  • Support declaration and consumption of user-defined Unsigned Right Shift operator. #60616
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - UnsignedRightShift
  • Refactor entry point finder code #60614
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Fix our INavigableSymbol to not root an entire solution-snapshot #60637
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Instrument ReferenceCachingCS for flakiness #60585
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Remove unused resources and extension in CodeStyle #60619
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge main into features/nameof-parameter #60625
    Area-Compilers
  • Always use text edits in completion for correctness #60466
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next
  • Implement handling of rename intent #59410
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Pause computation of navbar items when a buffer is not visible #60607
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge 'main' into features/semi-auto-props #60617
    Area-Compilers, auto-merge
  • Fix attribute arguments crash in main #60622
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge 'main' into UnsignedRightShift #60623
    Area-Compilers, auto-merge
  • Add FixAll in containing type/member support for code fixes #59989
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Move formatting analyzer to `Analyzers` layer #60549
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Support built-in unsigned right shift operators. #60560
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - UnsignedRightShift
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #60613
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #60641
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Global indentation options - take 2 #60565
    Area-IDE
  • Implement source generator timing APIs #60267
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Show linked symbol in Inheritance Margin #60225
    Area-IDE
  • Support ref field declarations from source and metadata #60416
    Area-Compilers
  • Extend scope of type parameters in attributes #40525
    Area-Compilers, C# 11.0
  • Async suggestions improvements #60528
    Area-IDE
  • handle null compilations in entry point finder #60562
    Area-IDE
  • Fix crash when combining reordered arguments with params array #60590
    Area-Compilers, Needs Shiproom Approval, 17.2
  • Support SetsRequiredMembersAttribute #60392
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove IDynamicFileInfo-added syntax trees to attempt to improve perf #60531
    Area-IDE
  • Fix Introduce local formatting #47510
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add ServiceHub helpers recommended in previous PR #60604
    Area-IDE
  • [EE] Implement IDkmClrFullNameProvider2 in Roslyn's ResultProvider Formatter. #60522
    Area-Interactive, Community
  • Check val escape for initializers of fields with ref-like type #60577
    Area-Compilers
  • Implement IAttributeOperation #59369
    Area-Compilers, Community, Feature - IOperation
  • Remove crash workaround in `.editorconfig` #60535
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Cleanup AbstractBuiltInCodeStyleDiagnosticAnalyzer #60537
    Area-Analyzers, Community
  • Grab bag of UTF8 string support in IDE features #60599
    Area-IDE
  • Use ExpeditedDelay in with our features that pause while non-visible #60608
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Update to latest stable version of Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.PublicApiAnalyzers (3.3.3) to fix Roslyn crashing issue #41099
  • Results<T1, TN> union types should implement IEndpointMetadataProvider #41097
  • Can't debug SpaProxy on Linux Docker container #41093
  • Root level `.vsconfig` does not provide all the necessary prerequisites #41092
  • ASP.NET Core IIS hosting failure (In-Process) if a file called "dotnet" is present in the project root. #41089
  • There is no file with ID 1. The file list may have changed #41085
  • [ 7.0.100-preview.3.22179.4] error CS1660 when trying to build a project that is using Telerik.UI.for.Blazor(2.22.0) #41091
  • Unexpected behavior when using Results method as delegate #41082
  • SignalR client should send keepalive ping immediately when connected #41081
  • Svg <title /> tag affects page title! #41080
  • Quarantine GET_RequestReturnsLargeData_GracefulShutdownDuringRequest_RequestGracefullyCompletes #41074

Closed

  • Allow parameter and return types of route handler delegates (Minimal APIs) to contribute to endpoint metadata #40646
    7.0-preview4
  • Introduce way for route handler delegates (Minimal APIs) to return union results (i.e. multiple `IResult` types) #40672
    7.0-preview4
  • Blazor Server MainLayout not always disposed with long polling #41056
  • Add description to ProducesResponseTypeAttribute #40836
    7.0-preview4
  • Derived InputBase<T>, overridden methods not triggered #41072
  • Blazor Webassembly always getting ERR_CONNECTION_RESET #40962
  • IIS Express module "AspNetCoreModuleV2" is removed after installing Visual Studio 17.1.1, breaking IIS Express support #40730
    7.0-preview4
  • Blazor Http client doesn't timeout #41069
  • Consider trimmer friendly alternatives in Http.Routing that do not initialize a RouteValueDictionary #40975
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Hot reload fails when running the blazor wasm hosted app in without debugging mode #40154
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Blazor Server - Cannot find the fallback endpoint specified by route values: { page: /_Host, area: } exception #40854
  • Can't established SignalR connection as negotiate results in 404 #40870
  • Disable log in custom AuthenticationHandler #40895
  • SignalR 405 when connecting via TestServer #40939

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable Latin1 request targets #41098
    area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • Normalize data protection app discriminator #41095
    area-dataprotection
  • Update InputFile error message for stale references #41094
    blocked, area-blazor
  • Add option to not cache assembly references in runtime razor compilation #41086
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Quarantine GET_RequestReturnsLargeData_GracefulShutdownDuringRequest_RequestGracefullyCompletes #41075
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Implement IProvideEndpointMetadata & IProvideEndpointParameterMetadata #40926
    area-runtime, api-approved, 7.0-preview4
  • Introduce the Results<TResult1, TResult2, TResultN> union types #40986
    api-approved, area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview4
  • Create .git-blame-ignore-revs #41087
    7.0-preview4
  • Annotate Microsoft.AspNetCore.Routing for trimming #40974
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview4
  • Add trimming guidance for developers #40902
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview4
  • Revert "Move CredScanSuppressions.json to root of repo (#39780)" #41070
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview4
  • Switch to built-in IsTrimmable property #41021
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview4

Updated

  • [SignalR] Add client return results #40811
    area-signalr
  • Caching common HttpResults types #40965
    area-web-frameworks
  • [release/2.1] Turn on Component Governance #40885
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x
  • Hosting Bundle uninstall should uninstall underlying runtimes #40707
    area-infrastructure
  • JSON "null" response body rejected as an empty response body #41002
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Add Request Decompression middleware #40279
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Allow sidebar to scroll for tall menus #41062
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • Output caching middleware #41037
    area-runtime

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improve SOS diagnostics for OSR methods #2992
    .NET 7.0
  • Run tests with dotnet trace #2989

Closed

  • EventListener is filtering at LogAlways verbosity has special cased behavior that should be appropriately documented #2445
    .NET 7.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Set the build ID using arcade's scripts instead of retrieving it from another job #2993
  • Add dotnet-trace report stat command #2988
    enhancement, dotnet-trace

Merged

  • Merge main into release/stable #2987

Updated

  • [Infrastructure] Add devcontainer infra to diagnostics repo #2986
    Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MAUI Border doesn't expand #5895
  • Re-enable foldable in the sample #5894
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • MinVersion of TargetDeviceFamily not set correctly when TargetPlatformMinVersion is not set in project file #5890
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • [Windows] Using System.Reactive Increases Package Size #5888
    Future
  • Windows Navigation Bar does not display Title and/or ToolbarItems Correctly #5887
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Unable to build Windows class libraries with dotnet build #5886
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Publishing a Windows app doesn't produce an msix #5884
    6.0.300
  • Generate the manifest/plist entries for reseizetizer #5883
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Publishing an unpackaged Windows app fails by default #5881
    6.0.300
  • Provide a TabControl like in WPF #5878
  • OnAppearing firing twice when using Shell.Current.GoToAsync() #5877
    6.0.300-rc.3

Closed

  • Creating android archive from VS 2022 17.2.0 preview 2.1 gives Error "Cannot create an android archive 'xxx' because the project does not have a package name". #5862
  • Remove target/sdk versions from android manifest xml #5882
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • In RC1, FontImageSource does not work on Image.Source #5859
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Listview Viewcell Context Actions aren't bound to the datatemplates viewmodel #5783
    6.0.300
  • Android back button crashes default xaml MAUI app #5873
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Maui forms shrinking in release mode #5628
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix backbutton visibility when popping #5893
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Clean-up and fix VisualTreeElementExtensions hit testing #5892
  • [android] Update to latest AndroidX packages with better Trimmable support. #5889
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Blazor] Support unpackaged Win UI apps #5880
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [iOS] Implement iOSPlatform Specifics #5879
    platform/iOS 🍎
  • #4013 fixed fontimagesource color and size loading issue #5876
  • test xamarin #5874

Merged

  • Something here is causing duplicate entries #5891
  • Remove sdk versions from android manifests in templates #5885
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Also allow things to build with dotnet #5875
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • Fix Windows local dotnet builds #5870
    platform/windows 🪟, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Update WindowsAppSDK to 1.0.2 #5869
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, area/infrastructure 🏗️, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • Close Web Message Channel Ports in Android Blazor Hybrid #5867
    area/blazor 🕸️

Updated

  • Don't do manifest things for self contained apps #5896
    t/bug, area/single project ☝️, platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • Adds Tizen backend #2360
    area/setup 🪄, Future
  • Remove iOS Compat ColorExtension ToUIColor overlap #5854
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/migration 🚚
  • Updating SupportedOSPlatformVersion property in project templates #5866
    area/templates 📄
  • Ensure GroupValueChangedMessage is received #5646
    area/controls 🎮
  • [Windows] Implement Windows Platform Specifics #5855
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️
  • Fix some of the violations of Platform Compatibility Analyzer CA1416 #5650
    area/tooling ⚙️
  • [Android] Implement Android Platform Specifics #5831
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • HasConversion Fails for Property of OwnedEntity #27788
  • A foreign key is not being genrated for self referencing indirect many-to-many relationship #27785
  • "dotnet ef migrations bundle" => bundle.exe unexpected exit code on failing migrations #27783
  • CosmosDB Point Read not taking into account partition and id #27782
  • How to add a Postgres concurrency shadow property when using `IMutableEntityType` #27781
  • Support inheritence with JSON POCO mapping #27779
  • KeyLess entity #27778
  • Scaffold entity configuration into separate files #27777

Closed

  • Fluent API HasConversion Inheritance EF.Core NET 6 #27784
  • EFCore cli tool command "dotnet ef dbcontext scaffold" , Options: -d|--data-annotations ,'-d' is invalid #27780
  • Ensure converters and comparers are handled by type mapping #17962
    7.0.0
  • Support value generation with converters #11597
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • Support value generation for converted types #27759
    providers-beware
